thread.title: CustomerTodd VanHyning
thread.title_full: Bay Alarm Medical reviewed by CustomerTodd VanHyning

author: CustomerTodd VanHyning
title: CustomerTodd VanHyning
text: Tripped over blind dog, fell into tub, shower door wall against one side blocking way to pull up, wedged against wall other side could only move fingers, activated alarm around neck, local fire department came in minutes, actually saved my life. Thank you.. Todd VanHyning, Diamondhead, Ms. live alone, would never have been found
